articles.description: LUCIFER season 6 is all Lucifer fans can talk about after it emerged show creators Idly Modrovich and Joe Henderson were in talks with Netflix to save the series once again but has Lucifer season 6 been cancelled?

articles.description: Tom Hanks, 63, said he was so weak he could barely do a simple 30 minute workout but admits his wife had it a lot worse with 102F fever and chills
articles.content:
Hollywood star Tom Hanks has shared details on exactly how he felt during his battle with coronavirus.
